Also, why do some doctors say that it doesn't do any good to find a a recurrence early? If you have mets somewhere, wouldn't it be better to find them before they spread to several places/organs/bones?

Posts.Content: Dec 12, 2016 05:16AM jpr143 wrote: zarovka and dlb823: Thank you for your replies. My GP thinks my headaches may be sinus related but without congestion, I am skeptical. I will take the antibiotics he prescribed but will pursue a CT scan if I am still having these symptoms in 3 weeks. My first oncologist was the one that made that comment.
